meta.dc:title: S863 ENR: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

main.name: S863

content.p: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Clarification of grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

subsection.heading: Grade.—
subsection.chapeau: The list in section 7404(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.content: by striking “PODIATRIC SURGEON (DPM)” and inserting “PODIATRIST”; and

by inserting after the item relating to “Physician and surgeon grade.” the following new item:
“Podiatrist grade.”.

paragraph.heading: In general.—
paragraph.chapeau: Section 7431 of such title is amended—

subparagraph.content: by striking “physician and dentist” each place it appears and inserting “physician, podiatrist, and dentist”;
by striking “physicians and dentists” each place it appears and inserting “physicians, podiatrists, and dentists”;
by striking “physician or dentist” each place it appears and inserting “physician, podiatrist, or dentist”;
by striking “physicians or dentists” each place it appears and inserting “physicians, podiatrists, or dentists”;
by striking “Physician and Dentist” each place it appears and inserting “Physician, Podiatrist, and Dentist”; and
in subsection (e)(1)(A), by inserting “podiatrists and” before “dentists.”.

paragraph.heading: Administrative matters.—
paragraph.content: Section 7433 of such title is amended by striking “physicians and dentists” each place it appears and inserting “physicians, podiatrists, and dentists”.

paragraph.heading: Conforming amendment.—
paragraph.content: The heading of subchapter III of chapter 74 of such title is amended by inserting “, Podiatrists,” after “Physicians”.

paragraph.heading: Clerical amendment.—
paragraph.content: The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 74 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to subchapter III and inserting the following new item:“Subchapter III—Pay for Physicians, Podiatrists, and Dentists”.

paragraph.heading: Technical amendment.—
paragraph.chapeau: Section 7433 of such title is further amended—

clause.content: by striking “(1) The Secretary” and inserting “The Secretary”; and
by redesignating paragraph (2) as subsection (b); and
by striking “In prescribing” and inserting “Recommendations and views.—In prescribing”; and
by striking “this paragraph” and inserting “this subsection”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
